The Center offers the following services to promote health and wellness for anyone.

Consultations with Doctors

Doctors of various specialties who volunteer at the Center offer free consultations, screening, advice on healthy eating and living, prescriptions and in some cases free medicines. Doctors visit twice a month typically on 1st and 3rd Saturday of each month. In addition to offering these services on site, the Center organizes monthly mobile health camps in the nearby communities to provide similar care for people with no access to health care or transportation to come to the Center. The doctors who currently offer these services regularly specialize in Internal Medicine and Homeopathy (alternative medicine).

Yoga & Meditation

Workouts for body, mind and soul that promote overall wellbeing are offered every Saturday at 8am at the Center. Additionally, the Center organizes special workshops by inviting renowned Yoga teachers to offer guided coaching to individuals. These sessions are open for all.

Nutrition Workshops

Eat right and stay healthy! Workshops are conducted at the Center presenting creative culinary ideas that are tasty and zesty! There will be a special focus on diabetes and methods to control it with proper diet.
